Il vous apportera l'expérience de jeu la: This will give you the gaming experience closest to the original system,
L'option rembobinage vous autorise à eff: The rewind option allows you to rewind the game whilst playing.
Cela peut ralentir certains émulateurs (: This can slowdown some emulators (snes, psx) if you enable it.
Cette option vous permet de créer une sa: This option automatically saves the state of the game when you exit and automatically reloads it once you restart the game.
Une fois le jeu lancé et la sauvegarde c: Once the game is started and the savestate is loaded, you can return to the title screen by using the hotkey combo.
Une fois activée, votre écran sera rogné: Once enabled, your screen may look cropped, and the display will be an integer scale of the original ROM resolution.
Les haut-faits sont conçus par et pour l: Achievements are made by and for the community.

Les clés sont cryptées et ne sont donc p: The passwords are encrypted and are not re-displayed. This does not mean that the fields are emtpy!
Si vous renseignez une valeur, cela écra: If you enter a new value, it will overwrite the old one.
Démarrer sur la liste de jeux du premier: Start on the list of games from the first system (or the one selected)
ES se lancera et affichera directement l: ES will launch and display the list of games from the first system (or the one selected).
ES se lancera et n'affichera QUE le prem: ES will launch and display ONLY the first system (or the one selected).
ES n'affichera que les jeux listés dans: ES will only display the games included in the gamelist.xml files (accelerates display times).
Supprimer ou ajouter des ROMs nécessite: To take deletion or addition of ROMs into account, EmulationStation needs to be restarted.
Il faut arrêter EmulationStation avant d: You must stop EmulationStation before editing ROMs.
Vous devrez compléter le jeu et obtenir: You have to complete the game and get the achievements first time, just like it was on the original console.

Le mode Hardcore désactive *toutes* les: The Hardcore mode deactivates all possibilities of saving in the emulator! You won't be able to save or reload your game whilst playing.
